prompts: Create a digital-themed Pokemon that combines elements of technology and nature.
I want a Pokemon that appears to be made of geometric shapes and bright colors.
Generate a unique Pokemon that resembles a computer program with vibrant hues.
Make a creature that embodies both virtual reality and organic features.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a futuristic design with colorful accents.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a pixelated figure with a sleek appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that represents digital evolution with sharp angles and vivid colors.
